API

How to use

Pass the API key in NOBITEXPLORER-API-KEY header.

Transaction Details

GET /transactions/{network}/{tx_hash}
Parameters

  • network (string) – blockchain network to explore, e.g., BTC, ETH, BSC, FTM, POLYGON. It is Not case sensitive.

  • tx_hash (string) – transaction hash

Status Codes

  • 200 OK –

  • 403 Forbidden –

  • 404 Not Found –

  • 429 Too Many Requests –

  • 500 Internal Server Error –

          Response JSON Object:
                * tx_hash(string)
                * success(boolean)
                * inputs([Input])
                * outputs([Output])
                * transfers([Transfer])
                * block(integer)
                * confirmations(integer)
                * fees(string)
                * memo(string)
                * date(string)
                * raw(string)
                Input Object:
                      * currency(string)
                      * address(string)
                      * value(string)
                      * is_valid(boolean)
                Output Object:
                      * currency(string)
                      * address(string)
                      * value(string)
                      * is_valid(boolean)
                Transfer Object:
                      * type(string)
                      * symbol(string)
                      * from(string)
                      * to(string)
                      * token(string)
                      * value(string)
                      * is_valid(boolean)

Wallet Balance

GET /wallets/{network}/{address}/balance
Parameters

  • network (string) – blockchain network to explore, e.g., BTC, ETH, BSC, FTM, POLYGON. It is Not case sensitive.

  • address (string) –

Query Parameters

  • currency (string) – e.g., ETC, DOGE, DOT. It is Not case sensitive.

Status Codes

  • 200 OK –

  • 403 Forbidden –

  • 404 Not Found –

  • 429 Too Many Requests –

  • 500 Internal Server Error –

          Response JSON Object:
                * [Balance]
                Balance Object:
                      * address(string)
                      * received(decimal)
                      * sent(decimal)
                      * balance(decimal)
                      * rewarded(decimal)

Wallet Transactions

GET /wallets/{network}/{address}/transactions
Parameters

  • network (string) – blockchain network to explore, e.g., BTC, ETH, BSC, FTM, POLYGON. It is Not case sensitive.

  • address (string) – wallet address

Query Parameters

  • currency (string) – e.g., ETC, DOGE, DOT. It is Not case sensitive.

Status Codes

  • 200 OK –

  • 403 Forbidden –

  • 404 Not Found –

  • 429 Too Many Requests –

  • 500 Internal Server Error –

          Response JSON Object:
                * [Transaction]
                Transaction Object:
                      * tx_hash(string)
                      * address(string)
                      * from_address(string)
                      * to_address(string)
                      * amount(decimal)
                      * block(integer)
                      * date(string)
                      * confirmations(integer)
                      * direction(string)
                      * raw(string)
                      * memo(string)

Block info

GET /blocks/{network}/info
Parameters

  • network (string) –

Query Parameters

  • after_block_number (integer) – (Required)

  • to_block_number (integer) – (Required)

Status Codes

  • 200 OK –

  • 403 Forbidden –

  • 404 Not Found –

  • 429 Too Many Requests –

  • 500 Internal Server Error –

          Response JSON Object:
                * [Transaction]
                * latest_processed_block(integer)
                Transaction Object:
                      * hash(string)
                      * currency(string)
                      * from_address(string)
                      * to_address(string)
                      * value(decimal)

Block head

GET /blocks/{network}/head
Parameters

  • network (string) –

Status Codes

  • 200 OK –

  • 403 Forbidden –

  • 404 Not Found –

  • 429 Too Many Requests –

  • 500 Internal Server Error –

          Response JSON Object:
                * block_head(integer)
